Package org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorExtractor<T extends Serializable>
    This extractor class processes error situations that happen while processing in the MultiStepEvaluationFunction
    EvaluationCompleteExtractor<T extends Serializable>
    This interface if for the extraction of resulting GenericEvents after the successful processing of the MultiStepEvaluationFunction from the resulting Events of all inner EvaluationFunctions of the MultiStepEvaluationFunction.
    EvaluationFunctionStateFactory<T extends Serializable>
    Interface for the creation or reuse of EvaluationFunctions in a MultiStepEvaluationFunction
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloneStateEvaluationFunctionFactory<T extends Serializable>
    Implementation of the EvaluationFunctionStateFactory, which creates EvaluationFunction instances on base of prototype original (as a blueprint) by cloning.
    CloneStateEvaluationFunctionFactory.Builder<T extends Serializable>
    The builder for this class
    MultiStepEvaluationFunction<T extends Serializable>
    This implementation of the EvaluationFunction represents a linear statemachine.
    MultiStepEvaluationFunction.Builder<T extends Serializable>
    Builder for this class
    StateConfig<T extends Serializable>
    Configuring Object for one State in the MultiStepEvaluationFunction.
    StateEvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
    This is a special EvaluationContext implementation to be used inside a MultiStepEvaluationFunction, to separate it from the outer of MultiStepEvaluationFunction context.
